Cool to see open data from my PhD project reanalyzed using a diff statistical approach. But, I find it a bit weird that the authors never got in touch w/ us to make us aware of this project, or to get our thoughts on their interpret. What do others think?

item.title: #en @ 1465697429647347724
item.description: Together with @figshare & @digitalsci, we have just published the annual State of Open Data report.
